jack.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a piece of equipment used to lift a heavy weight off the ground, such as a car, and support it while it is in the air
jack.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a card used in card games that has a man’s picture on it and is worth less than a queen and more than a ten
jack.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: an electronic connection for a telephone or other electric machine
jack.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a children’s game in which the players try to pick up small objects called jacks while bouncing and catching a ball
jack.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a small metal or plastic object that has six points, used in this game
jack.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: a small white ball at which players aim larger balls in the game of bowls
